entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Norfolk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:50 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or rain. Local blowing snow. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm except rainfall amount 15 mm near Lake Erie. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:54 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
